actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the dumping of spent oil shale on any Federal land other than Federal land leased for the operation of shale oil recovery facilities.

summary.text: Prohibits the dumping of spent oil shale on any Federal land other than Federal land leased for the operation of shale oil recovery facilities. Terminates the lease for recovery of oil shale from public lands of any person violating this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the dumping of spent oil shale on any Federal land other than Federal land leased for the operation of shale oil recovery facilities.
